getName.name: getName
getName.short_desc: Returns the name of the setting (that is, a key for the setting)

getValue.name: getValue
getValue.short_desc: Returns the value of the setting.

getGroup.name: getGroup
getGroup.short_desc: Returns the group name of this setting that may be useful to group/namespaace settings.

toArray.name: toArray
toArray.short_desc: Returns an associative array with the group containing an array with name and value of the setting.

SENSITIVE.name: SENSITIVE
SENSITIVE.short_desc: Flag for settings that contain sensitive values (like credentials) that should perhaps handled with care and e.g.
